definition: environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Huan2 bao3 ju2

sentences.english: No surprise, then, that motor manufacturers have been urging the EPA not to allow E15 on the forecourt.
sentences.chinese: 车商正催促环保局不要批准E15上市一点也不奇怪。

sentences.english: Debao Ceramics has passed the certification from national Environmental ProtectionDepartment, which is considered as no radioactivity and anti-bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 德宝卫浴已通过国家环保局的无放射性及抗菌性认证。

sentences.english: They need to enhance the capacity of local EPAs.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该提高地方环保局的地位和能力。

sentences.english: Zone EPA Legal Section Jinke Zhang said.
sentences.chinese: 区环保局法制科的金科长说。

sentences.english: Property location, less than one hundred meters away from the Zhuhui EPA.
sentences.chinese: 楼盘所在地，离珠晖区环保局不足百米。

sentences.english: In order to clarify the specific reasons, the reporter will be followed by EPA experts, please come.
sentences.chinese: 为弄清具体原因，记者随后将环保局的专家请了过来。

sentences.english: The resigned county head of environmental protection was identified as Chen Jun'an.
sentences.chinese: 县环保局长陈军安引咎辞职。

sentences.english: (If so, please delete the line and consider a job as a forest ranger or flight attendant).
sentences.chinese: 如果有，删掉，考虑换一份环保局的工作。

sentences.english: Attempts to contact officials from the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Environmental Protection weren't successful Tuesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 记者周二下午试图联系北京市环保局的官员，但未果。

sentences.english: Official gets 11 yrs in jail for taking bribes.
sentences.chinese: 上海市环保局原副局长严舜钧受贿被判11年。

sentences.english: For serious environmental accident, the Site Commander should immediately report to environmental protection authority.
sentences.chinese: 特大环境事故，由现场指挥马上通知市环保局处理。

definition: City Urban Administrative and Law Enforcement Bureau (PRC)
pinyin: Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2
shi2 pin3 yao4 pin3 jian1 du1 ju2

definition: public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)

pinyin: Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2
